member.name: M:SDM_Project_Builder_Batch.modSDM.CombineShortOrBraidedFlowlines(D4EM.Data.Layer,D4EM.Data.Layer,System.String,System.String,System.Double,System.Double,D4EM.Geo.NetworkOperations.FieldIndexes)
member.summary: Eliminate flowlines and catchments by combining them up or down stream to reach large enough area and/or length Eliminate braided streams by keeping only the preferred channel
member.param: File name for newly created simplified flowlines
File name for newly created simplified catchments
Minimum area of a catchment (catchments smaller than this will be merged up or downstream)
Minimum length of a flowline (flowlines shorter than this will be merged up or downstream)
Hydrologic field indexes of flowlines and catchments

member.name: T:SDM_Project_Builder_Batch.SDMParameters
member.summary: All of the parameters available for affecting the internal workings of SDM Project Builder Batch The parameters most likely to be selected externally can be written to and read from a text file. Other parameters are mainly useful for internal testing
